import React, {Fragment, useCallback, useState} from "react"; import {Card, Button, Select, Page, Stack, TextField, DisplayText} from "@shopify/polaris"; import Dropdown from 'react-dropdown'; import 'react-dropdown/style.css'; class op extends React.Component{ } class AC extends React.Component { render() { const options = [ {label: '', value: 'today'}, {label: 'Your company', value: 'today'}, {label: 'How did you find us?', value: 'yesterday'}, {label: 'You register as', value: 'lastWeek'}, {label: 'Dear visitor!', value: 'today'}, {label: 'Date of birth', value: 'yesterday'}, {label: 'Country', value: 'lastWeek'}, {label: 'How did you find us 3?', value: 'today'}, {label: 'Accept Marketing Email', value: 'yesterday'}, {label: 'Interests', value: 'lastWeek'}, ]; return ( <>

by filling in these boxes.

Good evening, Dominic.

no spaces and length 30. Let

 ); } } export default AC;
